item.title: A Valentine's Day aurora may be visible in the skies of the northern U.S.

item.title: Federal judge blocks CFPB from laying off more employees
item.description: The ruling from a federal court in Washington, D.C., is a reprieve for CFPB staff who had been bracing for mass layoffs as early as Friday.
